description:
Whether you’ve watched the anime, played the games, or have simply been collecting Pokémon cards for years, Magikarp is an undeniable icon. The flopping fish ‘Mon seems adorable yet weak and frail at first glance - but, as we all know, it eventually evolves into a powerful Gyarados. While videogame Magikarp was just a stepping stone to Gyarados, the lil' red fish has a life of its own in the Pokémon TCG community - and this beautiful Illustration Rare is now worth 300% more than it was a year and a half ago.

Continue reading
title: This spectacular Pokémon card’s price quadrupled in just a year and a half
